briefTitle: Trial of Caldolor for Treatment of Pain in Post-Operative Adult Patients
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial of Ibuprofen Injection (IVIb) for Treatment of Pain in the Post-Operative Adult Patients
summary: The primary objective of this study of Caldolor (IV ibuprofen) administered to post-operative hospitalized adult patients every 6 hours for 48 hours is to determine the efficacy of Caldolor compared to placebo for the treatment of post-operative pain as measured by reduction in the requirement for the narcotic analgesic, morphine, post surgery

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in the Patient Demand for the Narcotic Analgesic, Morphine, Post Surgery
